PaymentAggregator.mainSelect: SELECT doc.cd_entita_fatt||'-'|| doc.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID --0 , TO_CHAR(pay.gl_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), --1 TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), --2 doc.amount_due_original, --3 TO_CHAR(pay.due_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), --4 amount, --5 pay.cash_receipt_id, --6 pay.receipt_number, --7 doc.trx_date, doc.due_date, doc.document_status, doc.competence_date, doc.amount_due_original, doc.amount_due_remaining, pay.receipt_date, pay.status, pay.confirmed_flag , pay.amount_applied, CASE WHEN ca.ezawe IN ('T', 'F', 'B', 'R') AND doc.document_status = 'CL' THEN 'RB' WHEN ca.ezawe IN ('T', 'F', 'B', 'R') AND doc.document_status = 'OP' THEN NULL ELSE '01' END AS augrd FROM dbi_user.wrk_oa_documents doc, dbi_user.wrk_oa_payments pay, account_vkp ca WHERE ca.legacy = doc.cd_entita_fatt AND doc.account_number = pay.account_number AND doc.customer_trx_id = pay.customer_trx_id ORDER BY doc.account_number, doc.customer_trx_id --cl + rid = 'RB' --op + rid = null --'01'

PaymentExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.LEGACY, --0 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.TIPO, --1 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.HERKF, --2 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.BLDAT, --3 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.BUDAT, --4 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.OIBEL, --5 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.AUGRD, --6 EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.ZINCRID, --7 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.LEGACY, --8 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.TIPO, --9 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.BUKRS, --10 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.HKONT, --11 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.VALUT, --12 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.BETRW, --13 EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.SGTXT --14 FROM EMIG_PAY_FKKKO, EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK WHERE EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.LEGACY=EMIG_PAY_FKKOPK.LEGACY ORDER BY EMIG_PAY_FKKKO.LEGACY
